resources.string: This App requires location permission to enable the \\\'my location\\\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \\\'ShareRoute\\\'.
Location permission is required for this App
Access to the location service is required to show the \\\'my location\\\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.
